section.p: This form appears when you have selected items for one client ID, but your current research is assigned to another ID

section.title: Current Research Assigned to a Different Client ID
p: Use this page to specify which Client ID you want to use for your research.
Your only choices on this page are to select either of the 2 buttons.

property.propvalue: View this item using the current Client ID <Client ID>
property.propdesc: Click this link to use the currently selected Client ID for your research.
Click this link to start a new research session, which will close all of your open tabs. You can revisit your recent activities using History.
